entities.name: the trash bin
entities.description: The trash bin is mentioned as the object that opens to reveal Diagon Alley.

entities.name: Diagon Alley
entities.description: Diagon Alley is introduced as a hidden alleyway that can be accessed through an archway in the wall.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the protagonist who spends his days exploring shops and eating outside cafes.

relationships.description: The trash bin opens to reveal Diagon Alley, indicating a direct connection between the two entities.
Harry is mentioned as exploring shops, indicating that he visits these establishments.
Harry is eating outside cafes, indicating a relationship between him and the cafes.
